params.812: Reach level 5 in the Defence skill.
params.813: Ensure your combat style is set to provide Defence XP. The Men, Chickens and Goblins near Lumbridge are suitable targets to fight.
params.814: Train your Defence trength to level 5 by fighting nearby monsters!|Equip your armour and weapon.|Ensure your combat style is set to provide Defence XP.|Take some food to keep your hitpoints high.|The Men, Chickens and Goblins near Lumbridge are suitable targets to fight.|Chickens drop Raw chicken that can be cooked and used as food.|You can bury bones to gain Prayer experience.
params.823: Set your combat style to the correct stance to gain Defence experience.
